text: Cold Fever () is a 1995 Icelandic American Japanese comedy drama movie directed by Friðrik Þór Friðriksson and starring Masatoshi Nagase, Lili Taylor, Fisher Stevens, Gísli Halldórsson, Seijun Suzuki. == Other websites == * * Category:1995 comedy-drama movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies directed by Friðrik Þór Friðriksson
title: Cold Fever
